Introduction

This application is used for secured data communication using the principles of Cryptography and Steganography. This is a pretty easy to use app. But before using this app you must have a introductory knowledge of Cryptography and Steganography. We have provided a very easy to use interface and a very easy to understand introduction of these technologies. The term cryptography is a Greek word which means "secret writing". It is an art and science of transforming messages so as to make them secure and immune to attacks. On the otherhand, steganography is the The art and science of hiding information by embedding messages within other, seemingly harmless messages. These are very vast streams. We have provided basic concepts of only selected techniques that we have implemented in our application.

The techniques we cover are as follows:

  • AES
  • RSA
  • Digital Envelope
  • LSB
  • Modified LSB(using Spiral Embedding)
